alert.note: Alert for Kent; New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 12:58PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New Castle, northwestern Kent, northeastern Queen Anne`s, Kent and southern Salem Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 1258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pleasant Hill to near Millers Island. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Middletown, Pennsville, Smyrna, Carneys Point, New Castle, Chestertown, Salem, Woodstown, Alloway, Clayton, Quinton, Delaware City, Rock Hall, Church Hill, Millington, Sudlersville, Betterton, Old Town and Glasgow. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 0 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
